text: Architectural theory is thinking, discussing, and writing about architecture. It is taught in schools dedicated to architecture. It is practiced by the most well-known architects. Architecturial theory comes in different forms, such as a lecture or book. The theory is often designed to be taught. The theory has been popularized through books around 1968. == References == == Other websites == * Collection of source documents in the history, theory and criticism of 20th-century architecture. Category:Architecture
title: Architectural theory
